pages.text: Farmer's Delight is a mod that gently expands upon farming and cooking in Minecraft, but I'm sure you were able to deduce that!

First off, there is no guidebook for Farmer's Delight, but there is a series of advancements that will help guide you along!  Knives will help you scavenge resources from both fauna and flora.  It will also get you Straw when used on grassy plants which you can use to make Rope which can be lowered from a higher area to a lower one, saving you the risk of become splatter upon the ground!  As you explore the land you will find Wild Crops which you can use to start your farm with, you can also find some samples of crops in Villages.

Once you progress a bit into farming/cooking, you will be able to prepare meals that not only keep you well fed but also offer a variety of stat boosts.  The meals tend to be quite large unfortunately, so they don't stack to large in your inventory.  However, the cooking pot can hold up to 64 servings of any meal. It can also be mined and carried with you as a type of food storage!
